====Compounds====

* {{ja-r|部門|ぶもん}}: [[division]], [[group]], [[branch]]

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ぶ}}

===Suffix===
{{ja-pos|ぶ|suffix}}

# [[division]], [[bureau]]
# [[school]] [[club]]
#: {{ja-usex|野球'''部'''|やきゅう'''ぶ'''|baseball '''club'''}}

====Usage notes====
This is a level higher than {{m|ja|-課|tr=-ka||department}}, since for example {{m|ja|部長|tr=buchō||division head}} is the boss of a {{m|ja|課長|tr=kachō||department head}}.
